Uses of Class
org.codehaus.preon.buffer.ByteOrder

Packages that use ByteOrder
org.codehaus.preon.buffer The package providing the abstractions for dealing with data encoded in sequences of bits. 
org.codehaus.preon.channel The package providing an abstraction for writing a bit stream, an a number of implementation classes.

          Writes nrbits bits of the int value to the channel, based on the ByteOrder passed in, in case the number of bits exceeds 8.
